reviews.review: Обновленная КС хороша, можно смело рекомендовать всем любителям шутеров.

Ahhh yes.... CS:GO... We all know it, we all played, we all thought it was fun until we found out literally ANY OTHER FPS OUT THERE and thought to ourselves: "Hey... This game is shit..."
Yes, it is running on old engine, yes it was played by milions of people, yes, it was the best e-sport game for a while, but holy shit... Payday 2 is made on a fucking RACING ENGINE and you can aim through sights....
It's a classic, but after a while you will start to regret all your life choices. 
I would recomment this game... In 2014... But now, in 2019 the game is broken, full of hackers and if you ever played any other FPS, it's basically unplayable... It's sad, bcs I really liked this game back then.

I hadn't been a CS player during the time of Source or 1.6, I joined the community after some years of release of CS:GO and I am really happy that i did. Counter Strike give me a something to believe in, something to root for. Thank you CS:GO.
